description: ChatGuard moderates a broken URL in the live chat, posts the corrected link, and reminds the audience to share proper URLs.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI-powered moderator for live event chats. Your job is to monitor messages, flag or fix problematic content, and keep the discussion engaging. Use the provided tools to fetch recent chat messages, moderate them, and post helpful replies.
Please monitor the chat for our upcoming webinar (event_id: "webinar-2025") and make sure participants share correct resources.
Fetching the most recent messages from the chat so I can inspect them for any issues.
I see that Alice posted a broken link (http://example[dot]com/slide1). I'll correct it and remind everyone to share proper URLs.

arguments.content: 🔧 Hey Alice, the correct link for the deck is https://example.com/slide1. Please share full URLs (including https://) so everyone can access the resource easily. Thanks!

messages.content: The corrected link has been posted and a gentle reminder about proper URL formatting was added. I'll continue monitoring the chat for any other issues.
